title: Three more dates
body:
Another three dates to add to next year's touring schedule:

They are:

Wed 18th April - Mexico City, Mexico - Foro Sol
Friday 13th July - Bilbao, Spain - BBK Live - Kobetamendi
Sunday 15th July - Oeiras, Lisbon, Portugal - Optimus Alive Festival

For information on dates and tickets, check the radiohead tour dates page.
